title: What's the RESTORATION HARDWARE font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312165139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RH_6558.jpg)

Help! Can anyone tell me which font this is?
author: carolynng

comments.content:
Hi  
This looks like Bembo or Bembo Std
Yes, it does! Thanks so much for your help. :o)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312165139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/030113_dpt_clearance_4881.jpeg)

Since you really seem to know your stuff... how about this one? Any idea?
